title: Shared Dependencies Schema
description: Defines the structure for shared_deps.json, which outlines shared dependencies between different parts of a system.

domElementIds.description: A list of DOM element IDs that are shared or relied upon.

description.description: An optional description of what the function does.

type.description: The data type of the parameter.

description.description: An optional description of the parameter.

parameters.description: An array detailing the function's parameters.

type.description: The data type of the return value.

description.description: An optional description of the return value.

returns.description: Details about what the function returns.

functionSignatures.description: An array of objects, each defining a shared function signature.

name.description: The name of the global variable.

type.description: The data type of the global variable.

description.description: An optional description of the global variable.

globalVariables.description: An array of objects, each defining a shared global variable.

payloadSchema.description: An optional JSON schema defining the structure of the message payload.

description.description: An optional description of the message and its purpose.

messageNames.description: An array of objects, each defining a shared message name and optionally its payload schema.

dataSchemas.description: An object where keys are schema names (string) and values are either full JSON schema objects or string descriptions of the data structures.

version.description: The version of this shared dependencies schema (e.g., "1.0").

notes.description: Optional general notes about the shared dependencies.
